System Management

This chapter describes how to manage system alarms, events counters and user operations on the PW EMS system.

  • Fault Management
    The PW EMS user interface (UI) uses fault management to manage and view active alarms and events raised by the SON components, HNG, and vBBU, and view their history.
  • Manage Audit Logs
    All user activities on the PW EMS are logged and available for auditing through audit logs. You can use the audit log (containing audit trails) generated by PW EMS to view user-performed operations information, which includes the time these operations were performed, whether they were successful, and who performed them when they were logged into the system.
